message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to make a smart financial decision.
Bob, I understand your position, but I believe the product's value justifies a higher price. I could meet you halfway from our previous offers. Would you consider $1,275,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to pay $1,225,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
